mapper.select: select attendNo, boardNo, userNo, attendDate, status from attendusers where boardNo = #{boardNo} and userNo = #{userNo}

SELECT mb.boardno , mb.userNo , mb.title , mb.matchgametype , mb.matchregion , mb.membernum , TO_CHAR(mb.matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS matchdate , TO_CHAR(mb.boarddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boarddate , mb.count , mb.status , u.nick FROM matchboard mb, users u where mb.userNo = #{userNo} and u.userNo = mb.userNo

SELECT mb.boardno, au.userNo, mb.title, mb.matchgametype, mb.matchregion, mb.membernum, mb.matchdate, mb.boarddate, mb.count, au.status as aStatus, mb.status, u.nick FROM matchboard mb INNER JOIN users u ON mb.userNo = u.userNo INNER JOIN attendusers au ON mb.boardNo = au.boardNo WHERE au.userNo = #{userNo}

select rownum, au.attendNo, au.boardNo, au.userNo, TO_CHAR(au.attendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS attendDate, au.status, u.nick, u.average from attendusers au, users u where au.boardNo = #{boardNo} and au.userNo = u.userNo order by attenddate asc
